text: The 1992–93 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 1992–93 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by coach Ralph Willard and future NBA player Darnell Mee.Basketball Reference – Darnell Mee, retrieved 1 May 2020 The team was Sun Belt Conference runners-up and won Sun Belt Basketball Tournament. They received the conference's automatice bid to the 1993 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament where they advanced to the Sweet Sixteen.2016-17 SBC Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 Mee and Mark Bell made the All-Conference and SBC Tournament team; Mee was also tournament MVP.2019-2020 WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 ==Schedule== 1992-93 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 1 May 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 1993 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 1993 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
title: 1992–93 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball team
